about_the_game:
DLC Memory in the Mirror - New Class - Ghost

[Prequel: The Search for Lost Memories]
Set before Diary of Little Red Riding Hood, Black Swan stumbles upon a magical mirror and is sucked into the Mirror World. On her way to escape from the Mirror World, Black Swan discovers that she is not the only one trapped and with the help of her friends, she begins to search for her lost memories...

[Auto Chess]
More freedom in single player mode
Dedicated to creating: storytelling + weak networking + more freedom to build

[Richer content]
6 races, 167 pieces, 85 equipment cards, 59 spell cards
New partners and bosses to meet the challenge

[New Version Exclusive Events]
14 new events such as Fairy Shop, Chameleon, Master Craftsman, Potion Workshop, Lottery Merchant, Grocery Merchant, Blind Box Merchant, etc.
Various ways to recruit partners, buy equipment, extra rewards, and raise stars

[Challenge upgrades]
10 levels of difficulty, 11 bosses and 31 elite monsters are waiting to be challenged
3 final truths waiting to be uncovered
